title: En Chella Kutti Lyrics Isakki Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: En Chella Kutti
Singer: Shreya Ghosal
Movie: Isakki
Music: Srikanth Dheva
Lyrics: Pa Vijay
Lyrics in Thanglish
Exact translation of tamil words
En chella kutti pattu kutti
enna solla daa.
un paasathuku eedu inai
yedhum illa da (2)

Boomi pola ennai enni
suthi varum sandhiraney
nooru jenmam unkoodave
vazhavendum mannavaney
En manadhil vandhavaney
ennuyiraai aanavaney

En chella kutti pattu kutti
enna solla daa.
un paasathuku eedu inai
yedhum illa da

Oh..nethuvara nenjukulle
yaarum illaye
ini unnavida naa vananga
saami illaye... (2)

Urangidum varayil, vizhigalil irupaai
imaigalai thaandi, idhayathil kalapaai

Unnakena naanum, ennakena neeyum
ondraaga, vazhvome,
 naam nooraandu kaalam

En chella kutti pattu kutti
enna solla daa.
un paasathuku eedu inai
yedhum illa da

Vaanam thooral podum kulir
mazhaikaalam
undhan kaigalthaan ennaku
kudaiyaagum (2)

Ini undhan arugil
nizha ena  irupen
un viral pidithu thunaiyena varuven
unnakena thaaney uyirana irupen
moochaai en pechaai ini endrum neeyada

En chella kutti pattu kutti
enna solla daa.
un paasathuku eedu inai
yedhum illa da
